TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PeerScope extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the current network scope of a peer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope All = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Specifies sign-in to the 'NearMe' scope and 'Internet' scope.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope Internet = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies sign-in to the 'Internet' scope. This scope facilitates connections with all contacts in the Contact Manager.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope NearMe = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies sign-in to the 'NearMe' scope. This scope facilitates connections to all peers on the same subnet via Peer Collaboration Methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that a peer not sign-in to a Peer Collaboration scope. Passing this value to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method generates no result.
